excerpt: "Nvidia revealed its new RTX 3000 line of Ampere-powered GPU earlier in the month--the RTX 3090, 3080, and 3070 cards. The new 3000 series is the second generation of RTX graphics cards that will run features like real-time ray tracing with much higher performance than current RTX cards."
